fields.name: Orphaned (No Lab)
fields.description: For researchers or equipment that are currently unassigned to a lab for any reason

fields.name: Structural Biology Lab
fields.description: Protein structure determination using X-ray crystallography and electron microscopy

fields.name: Protein Purification Lab
fields.description: Protein expression using E. coli and insect cells. Protein purification using chromatography techniques

fields.name: Biochemistry Lab
fields.description: Analysis of protein purity, binding affinity, and enzymatic activity using HPLC, ELISA, and fluorescence-based enzymatic assays
